mapper.sql: GUID, BRANCH_NAME, BRANCH_ID, CUST_NAME, CERT_TYPE, CERT_NO, CONTACT_INFO1, CONTACT_INFO2, AUM_MONTH_CURR, AUM_MONTH_LAST, AUM_TIMEPOINT_DEP, LOAN_BAL, OPENACT_BRANCH_ID, OPENACT_BRANCH_NAME, CTS_MARGIN_BAL, RPT_DATE, RPT_TYPE, OPER_ID, OPER_DATE, IMP_DATE, DELETE_FLAG, BANK_NAME, BANK_ID, CUST_NO_TYPE, CUST_NO, CUST_GENDER
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from SV_CLS_CUSTINFO
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
select sys_guid() from dual
insert into SV_CLS_CUSTINFO (GUID, BRANCH_NAME, BRANCH_ID, CUST_NAME, CERT_TYPE, CERT_NO, CONTACT_INFO1, CONTACT_INFO2, AUM_MONTH_CURR, AUM_MONTH_LAST, AUM_TIMEPOINT_DEP, LOAN_BAL, OPENACT_BRANCH_ID, OPENACT_BRANCH_NAME, CTS_MARGIN_BAL, RPT_DATE, RPT_TYPE, OPER_ID, OPER_DATE, IMP_DATE, DELETE_FLAG, BANK_NAME, BANK_ID, CUST_NO_TYPE, CUST_NO, CUST_GENDER) values (#{guid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{branchName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{branchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{certType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{certNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactInfo1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactInfo2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aumMonthCurr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{aumMonthLast,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{aumTimepointDep,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{loanBal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{openactBranchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openactBranchName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ctsMarginBal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rptDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rptType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{impDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custNoType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custGender,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update SV_CLS_CUSTINFO
GUID = #{record.guid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BRANCH_NAME = #{record.branchName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BRANCH_ID = #{record.branchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUST_NAME = #{record.custName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CERT_TYPE = #{record.certType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CERT_NO = #{record.certNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTACT_INFO1 = #{record.contactInfo1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTACT_INFO2 = #{record.contactInfo2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AUM_MONTH_CURR = #{record.aumMonthCurr,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AUM_MONTH_LAST = #{record.aumMonthLast,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AUM_TIMEPOINT_DEP = #{record.aumTimepointDep,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LOAN_BAL = #{record.loanBal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
OPENACT_BRANCH_ID = #{record.openactBranchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPENACT_BRANCH_NAME = #{record.openactBranchName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CTS_MARGIN_BAL = #{record.ctsMarginBal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RPT_DATE = #{record.rptDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RPT_TYPE = #{record.rptType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPER_ID = #{record.operId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPER_DATE = #{record.operDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
IMP_DATE = #{record.impDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DELETE_FLAG = #{record.deleteFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BANK_NAME = #{record.bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BANK_ID = #{record.bankId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUST_NO_TYPE = #{record.custNoType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUST_NO = #{record.custNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUST_GENDER = #{record.custGender,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update SV_CLS_CUSTINFO
BRANCH_NAME = #{branchName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BRANCH_ID = #{branchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUST_NAME = #{custName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CERT_TYPE = #{certType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CERT_NO = #{certNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTACT_INFO1 = #{contactInfo1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTACT_INFO2 = #{contactInfo2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AUM_MONTH_CURR = #{aumMonthCurr,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AUM_MONTH_LAST = #{aumMonthLast,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AUM_TIMEPOINT_DEP = #{aumTimepointDep,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LOAN_BAL = #{loanBal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
OPENACT_BRANCH_ID = #{openactBranchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPENACT_BRANCH_NAME = #{openactBranchName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CTS_MARGIN_BAL = #{ctsMarginBal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RPT_DATE = #{rptDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RPT_TYPE = #{rptType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPER_ID = #{operId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPER_DATE = #{operDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
IMP_DATE = #{impDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DELETE_FLAG = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BANK_NAME = #{bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BANK_ID = #{bankId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUST_NO_TYPE = #{custNoType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUST_NO = #{custNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUST_GENDER = #{custGender,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where GUID = #{guid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update SV_CLS_CUSTINFO set BRANCH_NAME = #{branchName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BRANCH_ID = #{branchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUST_NAME = #{custName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CERT_TYPE = #{certType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CERT_NO = #{certNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTACT_INFO1 = #{contactInfo1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTACT_INFO2 = #{contactInfo2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AUM_MONTH_CURR = #{aumMonthCurr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, AUM_MONTH_LAST = #{aumMonthLast,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, AUM_TIMEPOINT_DEP = #{aumTimepointDep,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LOAN_BAL = #{loanBal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OPENACT_BRANCH_ID = #{openactBranchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPENACT_BRANCH_NAME = #{openactBranchName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CTS_MARGIN_BAL = #{ctsMarginBal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RPT_DATE = #{rptDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RPT_TYPE = #{rptType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPER_ID = #{operId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPER_DATE = #{operDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, IMP_DATE = #{impDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DELETE_FLAG = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BANK_NAME = #{bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BANK_ID = #{bankId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUST_NO_TYPE = #{custNoType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUST_NO = #{custNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUST_GENDER = #{custGender,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where GUID = #{guid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
